## hpr1572 :: An Open Source News Break from Opensource.com

 
In this episode: The new Fedora Scientific Spin, open source approaches to pharmaceutical research, and the Apache Open Climate workbench.


Links:


https://opensource.com/life/14/6/linux-distribution-science-geeks

https://opensource.com/health/14/6/can-open-science-help-patients-and-save-pharma

https://opensource.com/life/14/6/NASA-Earth-science-open-source
